second_text: We provide on-demand and customizable delivery services, through our  seamless digital platform, that is designed to support users' need for ease and transparency.
card_a_text: Léa has a birthday party, she orders a little black dress from her favourite store. The dealer packs and logs a delivery on the TexKoop app. A rider is matched, picks the parcel up and delivers to Léa.
card_b_text: Guillaume has an important presentation but forgets his laptop at home. He logs unto the TexKoop app and requests an urgent errand.  A rider goes to his house, picks the laptop and delivers it to him. Voila!
card_c_text: Hugo is a student at the university. He needs some extra cash and feels becoming a rider on TexKoop is a great idea. However he has no bike to use. He opts for bike rental and gets one readily.
card_d_text: Agro recieves an order but the goods are located at two separate stores. The Manager logs a delivery on the TexKoop app and a rider  is dispatched; he picks the items from both stores and makes the delivery.
wedo_text: We are solution oriented; always looking out to satisfy the needs of our customers.
delivery_head: We Offer Delivery Services To Businesses And Customers In The Retail And E-commerce Sectors.
serv_a_text: Fashion pieces and accessories are the hallmark of personal statements. We ensure short delivery times, coupled with package safety.
serv_b_text: Electronics should be handled delicately. We ensure that even high-value goods are insured and arrive intact.
serv_c_text: Medicine delivery necessitates a high-level of dependability. We ensure that shipments arrive safely, and on-time.
scenario_a: Loraine is a woman of style and elegance and loves her expensive collection of clothings. The challenge is that they always get missing in transit.
scenario_b: Raphaël is working late at the office, putting finishing touches to an urgent contract proposal. He is done and needs to print. Sadly the printer wouldnt work.
scenario_c: Imagine you are feeling unwell and in need of quick pharmaceutical input. Using existing logistics options means late delivery - owing to delays either from traffic, vehicle break-down etc.
solution_a: She learns of TexKoop’s real-time tracking features and option to get ready and reliable response from a customer support agent on the go. She feels this is the solution that she has long needed.
solution_b: He instantly orders from an electronic store. The manager packs and logs the delivery on the TexKoop app. A rider is matched, he picks and safely delivers the parcel to Raphaël.
solution_c: This is where TexKoop’s quick delivery option powered by a fleet of electric bikes comes in handy. We deliver across Lyon and guarantee package safety while in transit.
